name: Cloudflare Tunnel
description: Secure tunnel to expose your local development to the internet with custom domains, DDoS protection, and zero-trust security

scripts.cf:tunnel:status: docker exec $(npm config get name)_cloudflared cloudflared tunnel info 2>/dev/null || echo 'Tunnel not running'
scripts.cf:tunnel:setup: echo 'Please follow the setup guide in docker/cloudflare/README.md to configure your tunnel'
